channel.title: Comments on: David MacFarland Retires December 22

item.title: By: Julia Kochi
item.dc:creator: Julia Kochi
item.description: Wishing you the best in your retirement! Your smile and rotating art gallery will be missed.
item.content:encoded: Wishing you the best in your retirement! Your smile and rotating art gallery will be missed.

item.title: By: Christopher Shaffer
item.dc:creator: Christopher Shaffer
item.description: You will be missed! 4,500 titles in the public domain is no small feat.
item.content:encoded: You will be missed! 4,500 titles in the public domain is no small feat.

item.title: By: Kemi Amin
item.dc:creator: Kemi Amin
item.description: Always ready to help and greet you with a smile. Congrats David!
item.content:encoded: Always ready to help and greet you with a smile. Congrats David!

item.title: By: Alan Daniel
item.dc:creator: Alan Daniel
item.description: David, you made working in technical services much more enjoyable over six years.
item.content:encoded: David, you made working in technical services much more enjoyable over six years.

item.title: By: Jim Munson
item.dc:creator: Jim Munson
item.description: Best wishes, David! And I think you still owe us an aria or two ...
item.content:encoded: Best wishes, David! And I think you still owe us an aria or two …

item.title: By: Sarah McClung
item.dc:creator: Sarah McClung
item.description: I've very much enjoyed getting to know you and working alongside of you, David. Wishing you all the best in your retirement!
item.content:encoded: I’ve very much enjoyed getting to know you and working alongside of you, David. Wishing you all the best in your retirement!

item.title: By: Shauna Hannibal
item.dc:creator: Shauna Hannibal
item.description: We are going to miss having you around here so much, David! Congrats on your retirement!
item.content:encoded: We are going to miss having you around here so much, David! Congrats on your retirement!
